OOC: In generation one every single Decepticon could fly, no matter what
they transformed into. Heck, they could tranform into a rock, and still fly
in robot mode. It was something that set them apart from the Autobots. Im
not making this up, as the Stunticons flew in quite a few episodes, and I
even wrote in his profile that he could.
